errors.error_description: The installation command is missing the `pkcs11` extra dependency. Although the command that follows it mentions PKCS#11 support, users who copy the command will not install the necessary packages for that feature.
The link to the contribution guidelines points to a non-existent file 'docs/CONTRIBUTING.md' instead of the correct 'CONTRIBUTING.md' in the root directory, resulting in a broken link.
correction_candidates: please make sure to review the [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) before making your contribution.
please make sure to review the [contribution guidelines](.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) before making your contribution.
please make sure to review the [contribution guidelines](docs/contributing.md) before making your contribution.
please make sure to review the [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING) before making your contribution.
errors.golden_answer: please make sure to review the [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) before making your contribution.
